fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives: On a European level, Cloudflare follows issues related to the Digital Single Market, with particular interest in policy areas related to data protection/privacy, cyber-security, online content / intermediary liability and internet governance.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Cloudflare is a member of CCIA, CDT and techUK. 
 
http://www.ccianet.org 
https://cdt.org

relevant_communication: Cloudflare regularly updates its website Cloudflare.com with communication updates, projects and blog posts.
goals__remit: Cloudflare is on a mission to help build a better Internet. Cloudflare protects and accelerates any Internet application online without adding hardware, installing software, or changing a line of code. Internet properties powered by Cloudflare have all traffic routed through its intelligent global network, which gets smarter with each new site added. As a result, they see significant improvement in performance and a decrease in spam and other attacks.
